title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about ways to annotate and gather data using crowdsourcing in general and in the context of natural language processing. The list should include case study of crowdsourcing where annotators have unconstrained work

Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about ways to annotate and gather data using crowdsourcing in general and in the context of natural language processing (NLP). The list includes case studies of crowdsourcing where annotators have unconstrained work
Crowdsourcing Annotation for NLP: A Survey by K
This article provides an overview of crowdsourcing for NLP annotation, including the benefits and challenges
